content: The Sherwin-Williams Co  has agreed to acquire rival U.S. paint company Valspar Corp   the companies said on Sunday  in an all-cash deal valued at about $9.3 billion.
name: Sherwin-Williams Company (The)
title: Sherwin-Williams paint company to buy Valspar for $9.3 billion

content: March 20 The Sherwin-Williams Co has agreed to acquire rival U.S. paint company Valspar Corp  the companies said on Sunday  in an all-cash deal valued at about $9.3 billion.
name: Sherwin-Williams Company (The)
title: UPDATE 6-Sherwin-Williams paint company to buy Valspar for $9.3 bln

content: Energy Transfer Equity LP confirmed it had made a $48 billion unsolicited bid for natural gas pipeline company Williams Companies Inc  hours after Williams rejected the offer as significantly too low.
name: Sherwin-Williams Company (The)
title: ETE confirms $48 billion bid for reluctant Williams Co

content: June 22 Energy Transfer Equity LP  confirmed it had made a $48 billion unsolicited bid for natural gas pipeline company Williams Companies Inc  hours after Williams rejected the offer as significantly too low.
name: Sherwin-Williams Company (The)
title: UPDATE 1-ETE confirms $48 bln bid for reluctant Williams Co
